long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple dark mode toggle for every website.

Your eyes will thank you later ðŸŒ™


This extension lets you toggle dark mode on/off on any website, including Google Docs and Google Sheets.


*** Why Dark mode? ***

- Less strain on your eyes.
- Less energy and is more environmentally friendly.
- Studies show sleep improves when you have less bright light before bed time.

Bonus feature:  New tab with Google for easy access!
